long_description: The GoPro Handlebar/Seatpost camera mount lets you easily and securely attach your GoPro camera to seatposts, handlebars, chainstays, roll bars, bolt heads, booms, control bars and more. Clamp mounts on tubes, frames and other objects with diameters ranging from 0.75 - 1.4 in. Includes a 3-way adjustable pivot arm. Mount is compatible with all GoPro quick-release cameras including the Helmet Hero Wide, Motorsports Hero Wide, Motorsports Hero, Surf Hero, and Wide Hero cameras. Mount is not compatible with the Digital Hero 5 Wrist camera.
short_description: The GoPro Handlebar/Seatpost camera mount lets you easily and securely attach your GoPro camera to seatposts, handlebars, chainstays, roll bars, bolt heads, booms, control bars and more.
